CheckList Detail: Check for individually handled generate error activity in process
Remarks: Please validate the generate error activities which are implemented for individual activities

CheckList Detail: Check for usage of costly process variables
Remarks: please validate if process variable can be removed by other variable

CheckList Detail: Check for missing usage of header properties in JMS Queue/Topic sender
Remarks: please validate if header level properties can be created and used

CheckList Detail: Check for missing JMS_TIBCO_PRESERVE_UNDELIVERED property in JMS Queue/Topic sender
Remarks: please validate for business critical messages JMS_TIBCO_PRESERVE_UNDELIVERED property should be configured

CheckList Detail: Check for durable topic subscriber
Remarks: please validate the durable topic subscriber

CheckList Detail: Check for absence of confirm activity for subscriber client acknowledgment mode
Remarks: please validate to use confirm activity for client acknowledged subscriber

CheckList Detail: Check for hardcoded/default timeout in JMS Queue/Topic receivers
Remarks: please validate hardcoded/default timeout value in JMS Queue/Topic receivers

CheckList Detail: Check for hardcoded destination in JMS Queue/Topic receivers
Remarks: please validate hardcoded destination in JMS Queue/Topic receivers

CheckList Detail: Check for hardcoded/default maxSession in JMS Queue/Topic receivers
Remarks: please validate hardcoded/default maxSession in JMS Queue/Topic receivers

CheckList Detail: Check for PermittedMessageType set other than Text type in JMS Queue/Topic receivers
Remarks: please validate whether permitted message type could be set as Text

CheckList Detail: Check for spawned sub-process usage
Remarks: please validate the spawned sub-process call

CheckList Detail: Check for custom java code activity usage
Remarks: please validate the custom java code activity configuration

CheckList Detail: Check whether more than two mapper activity is used
Remarks: please try to use appropriate number of mapper in any given process

CheckList Detail: Check whether complex mapper activity is used
Remarks: Please validate the activity as it as large or complex mapping used

CheckList Detail: Check whether local variables created and used in mapping
Remarks: please validate if local variables are created and used properly

CheckList Detail: Check whether any xpath is null/blank or missing
Remarks: activity has missing xpath logic

CheckList Detail: Check for probable No-Matching-Transition (missing otherwise transition)
Remarks: activity has Success-with-Condition with xpath

CheckList Detail: Check for activity which is not connected through any transition
Remarks: activity has missing transition

CheckList Detail: Check for process where it has more than 20 activities
Remarks: any process should not have more than 20 activities so that it can be easily readable and easier to debug

CheckList Detail: Check for two Read-file followed by parse-xml activity instead of one parse-data activity usage
Remarks: validate if the two Read-file and parse-xml activities can be replaced with one parse-data activity

CheckList Detail: Check all schemas are in the appropriate folder
Remarks: Please make sure all the schemas are in appropriate folder

CheckList Detail: Check all the Transition activities conditioned accordingly
Remarks: Please make sure all the Transition activities conditioned accordingly such as: Success, Success with condition, Success if no matching condition, and Error

CheckList Detail: Check all the major transition has a label
Remarks: Please validate Major Transition has a label.  Especially the ones that has two or more transition from one activity or going to one activity

CheckList Detail: Check all the username and passwords are encrypted
Remarks: Please make sure usernames and passwords are defined using global variables and passwords should be encrypted

CheckList Detail: Checkwhether any java code has sysout statements
Remarks: Java parts shall not use System.out logging

CheckList Detail: Check whether all calls to common-logging and exception-handling implemented correctly
Remarks: Calls to Common-Logging and Exception Handling Interfaces are correctly implemented with all relevant meta-data filled in.

CheckList Detail: Check whether errors are logged with error (or warning) level
Remarks: Please check all errors are logged with error (or warning) level

CheckList Detail: Check for naming standards for JMS
Remarks: Please follow naming standards for Subject, Topic and Queue names

CheckList Detail: Check whether Publishers not using wildcards in subject names
Remarks: Please avoid wildcards in subject names.

CheckList Detail: Check whether Queue readers not using wildcards in subject names
Remarks: Please avoid wildcards in subject names.

CheckList Detail: Check whether appropriate connection factories are being used for connecting to EMS
Remarks: Please validate connection factories are being used for connecting to EMS

CheckList Detail: Check all Queue and Topic receiver activities "Acknowledge mode is set to Client or Tibco Explicit EMS
Remarks: Please check all Queue and Topic receiver activities "Acknowledge mode is set to Client or Tibco Explicit EMS

CheckList Detail: Check whether log has entire process path
Remarks: Please validate logging Event/Component name has the entire process path

CheckList Detail: Check for appropriate GV value
Remarks: Please validate appropriate GV value (no 'zero' for max rows, timeout etc or Blank GVs), as per standard
